price:
Disse: "E quem pode desesperar-se da misericórdia
de seu Senhor, senão os descaminhados?"
arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقۡنَطُ مِن رَّحۡمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla waman yaqnaṭu min raḥmati rabbihi illā al-ḍālūna
